TopicTitle: Kerbal Railways proudly presents the latest in efficient public transport...

Articles.Content:
I was trying to imagine what kind of tech the kerbals use in the rest of their life: their cars, their ships, imagining what their trains might look like. Then I realised. We know the answer to that.

Apart from a few issues with roll stability, it works very well.

I always wondered if you could pull that off since I found out how to rotate parts...

Very nice!
Currently the VAB, SPAB, Launch pad and Tracking centers are the only structures on the planet

Currently the VAB, SPAB, Launch pad and Tracking centers are the only structures on the planet

There\'s a second space centre hidden in the mountains over on the next continent. The Jet Train Express runs a regular service there every Tuesday and Thursday.
How do you get the engines angled like that? I know how to get the facing downwards, but how do you get them to be pointed to the rear a bit?

How do you get the engines angled like that? I know how to get the facing downwards, but how do you get them to be pointed to the rear a bit?

Holding shift while rotating parts lets you do rotations smaller than 90 degrees.
Good idea, always wanted to do this! Could you add more realistic train models? Maybe explore mods that add more landing gear? Keep up the good work!
Could you try to implement a better landing ability for this Train? I land and always lose about 20-30% of my engins.
Funny, never tried to put more than 4 engines like that on a aircraft, quite epic.
I\'m reminded of a centipede... If a centipede could jet-propel itself through the air.
